ygData.subject: Re: Great EQ Computer?
ygData.msgSnippet: I read Computer Gaming World. They list their Killer Rigs, which you could build or have built. Alternately, the Alien line advertised in that same magazine
ygData.messageBody:
I read Computer Gaming World. They list their "Killer Rigs," which
you could build or have built. Alternately, the Alien line advertised
in that same magazine seems to be a superior game platform. If you
have several grand to spend, they have some fine machines.

Barto of Rivervale.

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Nygaardr, FC3" <nygaardr@c...> wrote:
> I will be buying a computer in a few months and am wondering what
some of
> you people use to play EQ. Going to spend a good bit so anyone
have any
> suggestions for GREAT eq computer (that's about all I do with the
computer
> play EQ, Web and MP3's). Anyone have any ideas?
>
> Mu
